Build ID: TPTP-4.4.0-200703270100

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Start the eclipse with IBM/SUNJava1.4.2
2.Create WSDM Project
3.Create new default MRT under WSDM project
4.Right click on the MRT file and click on Generate code menu
5.Codegeneration window pops up, select "Axis2 on osgi" in projectizer combobox and continue the codegeneration
6.Codegeneration fails and error throws up
